original_title: ベルベット・キス 禁じられた二人の時
overview: Hello Hijikichiro's original work "Velvet · Kiss" is made into a live-action image. Nitta is still swayed by Hanaoko's selfishness as ever. I was sending my absentee sleep every day with work and "friends" hanging on. While carefully meeting Saeki who I met by chance, there was no musical tone in the service to Hanaoko. Saeki sent me an e-mail so as to care for such Nitta. Nitora becomes ecstatic. And on the date of the day, calling Hanoko also heartlessly....
title: Velvet Kiss: Kinjirareta futari no toki
